title: Was Lavar Ball Really All That Crazy?
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss the fallout from the LeBron James-Isaiah Stewart kerfuffle, the inspirational themes from the movie King Richard, and the delectable meats, sides, desserts, and drinks they're going to have during Thanksgiving. Let's get it.
